nodes.text: The Hasamadhi Warehouse District was a district on the planet Coruscant. It was in close proximity to the Coruscant Underworld.

The Hasamadhi Warehouse District was first mentioned in the new Star Wars canon in the fifty-third issue of the Star Wars: Build the Millennium Falcon magazine, published on January 6, 2016. The Hasamadhi warehouse district first appeared in the Star Wars Legends in Shadows of the Empire, a 1996 novel written by Steve Perry.
